ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Woot New Weapon!
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not really actively working on the epic - I have the named wurm in BW (no big deal - just haven t gotten around to it) and of course the big three (white,
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not really actively working on the epic - I have the named wurm in BW
(no big deal - just haven't gotten around to it) and of course the big three
(white, red scales, and Trak jr). My guild can probably take Nortlav but
not Trak or Gore - so I WILL need a LOT of help when I get serious about it.

Yeah as Shada mentioned Guard is an AC buff - Level 29 Cleric.

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: John Grady [mailto:john_grady@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 05, 2001 11:43 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Woot New Weapon!


Grats Slyde! How's your epic quest going? Let me know if I can help, I'd
love a chance at your hand me downs when you get it :).

Btw, what does the Guard proc do?

Tzeetch
The Commune, Xegony

--- Daniel Sniderman <fuzzbone@...> wrote:

I was camping South Wing in Howling Stones last night and got a Guardians
Mace - 1HB 14/24 Procs Guard BRD PAL.

Kind of strange to have a proc on a buff not a click - and would be nice
if it affected whole party - not just myself - but those are quibbles.

The 14/24 ratio is by far better than my previous weapons - so I'm
thrilled I got it.
